author: jonesde
msg: Fixed issue reported by Hans Bakker which shows up in the strange situation for the content/views/Xxx URLs because they chain to a request with no event, and that was causing the overrideViewUrl to not get set to be picked up later when it is time to render the view; that is now fixed and the WebSite -> CMS tab is working again in the Content Manager
